overview: A twilight portrait that ultimately becomes a posthumous tribute to Crist√≥bal Halffter, one of the main compositional personalities of the last fifty years and a cultural and ethical reference. Through a kaleidoscope of statements and opinions of the protagonist himself and of composers, critics and also close friends, we get to know a Halftter who is both intimate and creative. His life trajectory is completed with performances by some of the best Spanish music interpreters in emblematic concert halls and sites in Spain.
title: Halffter: 90 Compases
